Posts.EditableText: I've reorganised the forums a little bit: - I've removed the "Feature Requests" forum. Old posts have been moved into either the Quest 5 or Quest 4 forums as appropriate. Please use the Quest UserVoice site instead: http://quest.uservoice.com/ - I've put a link in the "Links" section on the forum front page. - I've added this "Site Announcements and Feedback" forum - I've added a new Developer Forum, to discuss contributing to the Quyest open source project: viewforum.php?f=15
Posts.HTML:
I've reorganised the forums a little bit:

- I've removed the "Feature Requests" forum. Old posts have been moved into either the Quest 5 or Quest 4 forums as appropriate. Please use the Quest UserVoice site instead: http://quest.uservoice.com/ - I've put a link in the "Links" section on the forum front page.

- I've added this "Site Announcements and Feedback" forum

- I've added a new Developer Forum, to discuss contributing to the Quyest open source project: viewforum.php?f=15
